Main.title: Memorial Ermir Blushaj
Main.main_paragraph: Every year, Parma celebrates the memory of Ermir Blushaj, a significant personality for the city, with an annual championship. This event is not just a competition, but an opportunity to strengthen the values of community, integrity and friendship.

key.title: Keys
key.description: This section presents the phases of the tournament, starting from the group stage up to the head-to-head matches. Here you can follow the progress of the teams and see who advances to the next rounds.

team.title: Team
team.description: Discover the teams participating in the tournament. Each team is made up of local players who represent their communities, demonstrating talent and passion for football.

date.title: Date
date.description: Check the tournament calendar so you don't miss any matches. Matches are scheduled over several weeks, culminating in a thrilling final.
